meanings.definition: A vacation spent at home or nearby.
meanings.sent1: During the staycation, we explored our city and tried new restaurants.
meanings.sent2: Many families choose to have a staycation instead of traveling far away.
meanings.sent3: For our staycation, we pretended to be tourists in our own town.
meanings.sent4: The staycation felt like a mini adventure in our familiar surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The staycation allowed us to relax without the stress of packing and airports.

meanings.definition: The act of staying at home or nearby for a vacation.
meanings.sent1: Her staycation involved visiting local parks and museums.
meanings.sent2: Staycations can be a great way to unwind without the hassle of long trips.
meanings.sent3: During the staycation, we had a movie marathon in our living room.
meanings.sent4: The staycation turned our house into a cozy retreat from the outside world.
meanings.sent5: We made the most of our staycation by exploring hidden gems in our neighborhood.
